Lagos Open bụ asọmpi a kwadoro na International Tennis Federation nke na-ewere ọnọdụ kwa afọ na Lagos Lawn Tennis Club
A na-ahazi ihe omume ahụ dị ka asọmpi ITF nke ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụ nwoke nke $25,000
E meela ya na Lagos, Naịjirịa
N'ihi ọrịa Ebola nke West Africa, ọ bụ naanị ndị egwuregwu Afrịka na-asọ mpi mbipụta nke iri na anọ ma ITF mere ya asọmpi mmeri na-enweghị isi

Ka ọ na-erule n'afọ 2015, njem ahụ agbanweela, asọmpi ahụ nwetaghachikwara ọnọdụ mba ụwa ya. N'afọ 2018, a gbanwere aha asọmpi ahụ site na "Governor's Cup Lagos Tennis" gaa na "Lagos Open", nke ndị na-ahazi ya kwuru dị ka usoro sitere na ITF iji bulie ùgwù nke asọmpi ahụ sitere na asọmpi Futures gaa na usoro Challenger. Ngụkọta ego mmeri maka mbipụta nke afọ 2017 bụ $100,000.
